snippet: The House Judiciary Committee asked President Obama to allow seven top aides to be interviewed by Congressional investigators about media reports about national security matters.
abstract: House Judiciary Committee asks Pres Obama to allow seven top aides to be interviewed by Congressional investigators about reports in the news media about such national security matters as cyberwar against Iran and the raid that killed Osama bin Laden.
lead_paragraph: The House Judiciary Committee asked President Obama to allow seven top aides to be interviewed by Congressional investigators about media reports about national security matters.

headline.main: House Panel Wants to Question Obama Aides
headline.print_headline: House Panel Wants To Question Obama Aides

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
